website_summaries.verdict: Asics Gel Cumulus 21 GTX is a neutral running shoe that works for mild pronators or people who supinate. This waterproof running shoe is equipped with advanced features that aim to enhance comfort and running speed. It is specially designed for running on hard surfaces and keeping the foot dry and comfortable no matter how soggy the terrain.
pros: The Gel Cumulus 21 GTX is comfortable, according to many users
Several runners mentioned that the shoe is supportive
A few people highlighted the quality of materials used in the shoe
Many purchasers appreciated the shoe’s waterproof features
Some buyers said that it can keep the foot dry and cool for an extended period
It is perfect for long-distance runs, based on some reviews
A couple of users admired the lightweight structure of the shoe
cons: The shoe is a bit narrow, said some commenters
A wearer complained that the outsole is not durable enough

customer_reviews.title: Love goretex Asics - we buying nothing else
customer_reviews.text: Husband wears a 9.5 4e in cowboy boots and a 11.5 in Asics - they run narrow but buying sizes up work well - never side up and down in heels — fit wonderful out of the box and love GORETEX!!! He works in the rain and snow with dry feet. He walks around 6-9 miles everyday at work. You cannot do that in normal tennis shoes. Boots are too big and heavy.... please keep making goretex Asics!!!
customer_reviews.author: RockNRoll

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, nice looking too. ASICS run small.
customer_reviews.text: Love the gore tex to keep out dust from running. Long time ASICS buyer. Shoes run a bit small. I wear a 10 or 10.5 in other brands, but wear an 11 in ASICS. This is a really nice looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Harris

customer_reviews.title: Feet get a little hot
customer_reviews.text: These are good looking and comfortable shoes. My feet tend to get a little hot while wearing them on sunny days. Maybe this is due to the being mostly black and/or the gortex liner. They are very good for walking through wet grass and not getting your feet wet. I may update my review after about 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: good combo of a shoe
customer_reviews.text: a comfortable running, hiking, walking shoe...goood fit with the additional advantage for me is it's waterproof with gortex. that i'll need this winter in rain and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Vic T

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought size 9.5 shoes for my husband. The toe was right at the end of the shoe. We ordered a size 10. It was too big. He felt the 9.5 was comfortable. We will be sending the size 10 back.
customer_reviews.author: LFrank

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, nice weight. Like the color and appearance. Speedy shipping & packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Nebraska lady

customer_reviews.title: Fit not as expected but a good shoe with stable mid foot area
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 11.5 and if is tight in toe box . A shade smaller in size than other 11.5 ASICS that I use
customer_reviews.author: OJ

customer_reviews.title: Not cushioned enough
customer_reviews.text: Product did not cushion like previous Assics I have owned! Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Great Trail Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great feel and not to snug. 15 years ago wore a pair of goretex asics while thru hiking the John Muir Trail and loved them. Started trail running again, read a review on these shoes in Men"s Journal so I went with them . They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mike young

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, great fit
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not this shoe is difficult to find. I’ve been looking for some time. I’m a Asics nut, they are incredible shoes and are super comfortable. The color combo is very lively too
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schram

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fit nice and snug, laces not too long. Feels very shock absorbant.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Salomons if you’re looking for waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and don’t buy these shoes if you think your feet might get wet. If Gore-Tex only knew how terrible these shoes were they would never put their name on them.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Vanderploeg

customer_reviews.title: Half size smaller than the rest of their running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These run a half size small, it's bad enough that I'm an 11-11.5 in American Shoes and all my Asics are 12.5 which is 1.5 size above my normal, These will have to be a 13 to fit right... I mean are you kidding me... TWO sizes difference
customer_reviews.author: J. Fogarty

product_meta.title: ASICS - Mens Gel-Cumulus 21 G-TX Shoes
product_meta.description: Get on the road in any weather with the men's GEL-CUMULUS 21 G-TX performance running shoe by ASICS. GORE-TEX fabric ensures water remains on the outside while allowing heat and perspiration to escape. Your feet will feel cool, dry and ventilated, helping you go further than you thought possible. Specially designed for running on hard surfaces, this shoe features a dual-layer FLUIDRIDE midsole plus rear and forefoot GEL technology for shock absorption and energised cushioning over long distances. It also boast a springy EVA sockliner and FLYTEFOAM Propel technology, a lightweight foam formulated with a high-energy return elastomer for unrivalled toe-off and superb bounce with every step. Extra support comes from GUIDANCE LINE technology and I.G.S (Impact Guidance System) technology, which work to enhance your natural gait, helping you to move more efficiently as you clock up the miles. An internal heel counter holds your foot in position for added stability. The sturdy outsole features moulded snow rubber and our AHARPLUS heel plug, a highly abrasion-resistant rubber placed at heavy impact areas to help this shoe withstand serious wear overtime. The added reflectivity means you'll attract attention, even when light is in short supply. With all these high-tech features, the GEL-CUMULUS 21 G-TX model is a great choice for runners who want to push themselves further regardless of what the weather throws at them!
feature_bullets: FlyteFoam Propel Technology - ASICS energetic foam formulation that provides supreme bounce thanks to a unique elastomer compound.
FlyteFoam Lyte Technology - ASICS lightest weight midsole formulation that provides continuous cushion thanks to organic nano fibers.
AHAR Outsole - Acronym for ASICS High Abrasion Rubber. Placed in critical areas of the outsole for exceptional durability.
GORE-TEX Upper - Waterproof and breathable upper designed to protect the foot during extreme weather conditions.

Ortholite X-40 Sockliner - This premium sockliner features higher rebound properties while providing excellent moisture management and a high-level of breathability (Ortholite is a registered trademark of ATP Manufacturing LLC.)
